nodes.bodyText: why this? you need finally to ensure that serverSpan is always ended.
the span is created inside the try. It is not visible in the finally block.
good point. the span declaration should happen outside the try, I think. And the finally should check for nullity.

Whoops, sorry! I thought you removed the line accidentally.
